tool_description: GAK AJIO Scraper is the easiest way to access the AJIO products and search results
title: GAK AJIO Scraper

api_list.name: Get Product details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/product/{productid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
